attributes.action: Terminate Boris Johnson's membership of the Conservative Party
attributes.additional_details:
Read an article with more information here:
https://www.businessinsider.com/who-is-boris-johnson-the-gaffe-prone-politician-tipped-to-succeed-theresa-may-controveries-offensive-remarks-2019-5?r=US&IR=T#october-2017-dead-bodies-in-libya-3
attributes.background:
Comments he has made, among others:
Muslim women in burkas look like letter boxes; Women go to university 'to find men to marry; Pat her on the bottom and send her on her way; Islamophobia is a 'natural reaction to Islam; Black people are piccaninnies with watermelon smiles and Tank-topped bumboys.

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament is not responsible for the membership of political parties.
